content:
I've noticed a recent increase in the number of reports of ICE for "Failed to get crate data for crate##". Does anyone have a sense of what is behind that? It doesn't seem to be related to cross compiling (#56935) or incremental (reports are coming in with 1.52.1).

Just investigating if it is maybe cargo-related (maybe some race with pipelining?). I'm unable to reproduce any of the reports (except one which was someone using rustc with the wrong flags).
Do we have a sense of when it was introduced? I don't immediately recall related work here recently.

I'm not sure. The reports seem to have started early March. Some seem to have been closed as "fixed", but people are still reporting it on latest nightly.

Sample issues: #82991 #83045 #83138 #83670 #84026 #84049 #85127 #85248 #85262 #85282 #85370 #85386
